I wasn't able to see any server issues, but we can definitely investigate further.  Generally, issues like high ping can be caused by connection problems either locally or even how your ISP is reaching our game server.  I suggest starting out with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and rule out possibilities, then test it in a custom game.

If the issue persists, then run a traceroute to get an idea of what your routing is like to the game server.  Do this by downloading [WinMTR ](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/)and running a trace to the server based on your region:
NA - 104.160.131.1
EUW - 192.64.170.252

This will help us determine if there is some obstruction along the way.  Let me know!

Yeah, also having the same issue. Hopefully someone notices this and doesn't give such a dismissive response like referring you to the network connection troubleshooter.

I see some comments here that are suggesting the use of our troubleshoot guide is dismissive.  If there was a widespread issue happening that we were aware of, thee's no reason to keep that from you.  These guides, like the connection, have a high success rate of resolving issues because they cover the most common reasons for the problem instead of grasping at straws.  

In cases where it doesn't resolve the issue, it still rules out possibilities so we can move forward with investigating.  If you don't want to go over it that's fine, but there's not much assistance I can offer without it.
